projects.name: CROP MATURITY ANALYSIS
projects.description: Utilized LSTM algorithms in Deep Learning to analyze crop maturity from captured images, distinguishing under and over maturity optimizing harvest schedules. Training model using authorized datasets and achieve maximum efficiency and developed a web design for this model. Currently in the process of acquiring proficiency in backend development to seamlessly integrate the designed web interface with the crop maturity analysis model, thereby enhancing the functionality and accessibility of the website.

projects.name: DRIVING ALERT SYSTEM
projects.description: Developed and implemented an innovative Advanced Driving Alert System, enhancing driver attentiveness and road safety through real-time monitoring of hand position and alert the public by exterior led activated by voice commands. Integrated cutting-edge technology and human-centric design principles into the system, aiming to reduce accidents and distractions while emphasizing a strong commitment to road safety and the preservation of lives.

projects.name: FOOD ORDERING WEBSITE FOR COLLEGE CANTEEN
projects.description: Implemented features such as user login detailed daily menus, pre-ordering capabilities for users, and an admin panel for canteen staff to manage dishes and handle orders. Utilized technologies including React.js for the frontend, Node.js with Express.js for the backend, and PostgreSQL for database management, enhancing both user experience and operational efficiency.

experiences.description: Lead a project in the production department during my internship, driving an 11% increase in the efficiency of the auto toggle machine, showcasing expertise in process improvement. Additionally, actively contributed to team projects, fostering improved teamwork and communication within the corporate environment. Demonstrated commitment to workplace safety by training employees on safety measures and compliance standards, resulting in a safer work environment. Also gained valuable insights into large-scale MCB manufacturing processes while monitoring daily production to boost efficiency.

Developed front-end web design skills through hands-on experience with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Gained practical knowledge of responsive design principles and best practices for cross-browser compatibility. Proficient in creating visually appealing, user-friendly interfaces, showcasing a solid foundation design and development.

full_output.name: SARAVANAN
achievements_and_awards: Patent Publication: Development of an Advanced Driving Alert System Utilizing Ultrasonic Sensor and Voice Recognition Technology.
